website_summaries.verdict: Sporting a futuristic design combined with classic Nike detailing, the running-inspired Acalme sneakers are cool, casual, and comfortable. These shoes are enhanced with contemporary styling and improved upgrades that make it a great pair. In spite of a few tweaks to these trainers, they are built to give the most of their performance and function while being versatile for almost everything, from one’s next run, all-day work, or just for casual athletic styling.
pros: A great number of owners just love the overall appearance and performance of the Nike Acalme
The pair is extremely comfortable even for all-day wear, mention numerous reviews
Many impressed wearers like that these Nike shoes are super lightweight but sturdy
Some just consider the sneakers perfect and beautiful for them
They offer great arch support, as per a lot of users
Dozens of commenters find the shoes very stylish and match quite a number of outfits
These low-top trainers are definitely worth the price, state a handful of purchasers
The Nike Acalme is commended for being a supportive and breathable shoe
Plenty have received a lot of good compliments when wearing these Nikes
cons: A few wearers have claimed that the pair requires a break-in period
One user has observed that the back of the Acalme rubs up against the ankle
They get dirty quite easily, several owners have commented

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is nice and clean looking. The laces are bit long so I tucked them after tying them off. Many compliments. I wanted a shoe that would look nice in jeans and shorts. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Ken M

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorites
customer_reviews.text: My son age 14, loves these. They fit well, AND YOU CAN PULL THEM ON WITHOUT MESSING WITH THE SHOE LACES. this means you can double tie them, and they do not become undone on you in the middle of the school day. And they look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverSPb

customer_reviews.title: You wouldn't be happy too
customer_reviews.text: These shoes lasted 2 weeks before the eyelets began to snap. Couldn't get any satisfaction from the manufacturer or Amazon, we were just out. And had to buy more shoes. Beginning to become very unsatisfied with many things on Amazon. And really found that at Christmas time. The amount of things that came broken and Amazon wouldn't stand behind. And no one will return a call. I have 100's.Of dollars worth of junk that it is my responsibility to figure out how to return. Its harder than I thought it would be. I'm thinking about just buying from Wal-Mart.com
customer_reviews.author: Lora Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Not true size-couldn’t get his foot in it
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend and he couldn’t get his feet in them. Not true to size. They were a gift. Now I am exercising in them. But dare not tell any of my friends that they say 9.5 men lol
customer_reviews.author: M Senoj

customer_reviews.title: Buggz light-year infinity and beyond
customer_reviews.text: The name Infinity on them is a true statement. I'm a delivery driver for Amazon, so having some comfortable and durable shoes I can deliver in is very important. They tie up nicely and tight and are very motion active, the only con I do have about these, they have the memory foam insoles, which is good but they tend to lose durability and gets worn out faster than regular insoles. These are very nice and they stand out, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: D'Andre Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Best sneaker ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable sneaker I've ever had. I now have three pair just to make sure that I have them. I'm sure they'll stop making them as soon as I need a new pair still though!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cope

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of sneakers not for style...it's just to go for walks/to exercise. These sneakers are comfortable & look good overall. There is a smudge of glue on the toes of both sneakers towards the bottom, but it's okay because I paid less than $32.00 & they arrived in 3 days. I am a woman...I was searching Amazon for women's nike sneakers & these came up at the very bottom. I bought the size 6 which fits like a Nike women's size 8.
customer_reviews.author: BornWithStyle

customer_reviews.title: Looks great... feels ok.
customer_reviews.text: The look of the show is great and it takes a day or two to break in. I found some discomfort around the heel of my right foot at the beginning however after a day or two of wear that has diminished.
customer_reviews.author: Bill - CA

customer_reviews.title: Not for us!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the style and colors of this sneaker but, since it’s one continuous piece the instep made it really difficult to fit. Had to return!
customer_reviews.author: J. Garcia-Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t even had these for half a year, they’re in perfect condition... besides the part that holds the laces, it broke. Now I can’t tie my shoes without having any form of discomfort. These are made so cheap and are not worth the price for the risk!
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable  cool looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Usually wear an 11, ordered an 11.5 because I know Nikes run small and I have a few pairs in the closet. These sneakers however were the most uncomfortable things I've ever put on the foot. Way too narrow and high arched for my feet which are somewhat wide Nd flat. Wanted them to work because they do look cool but I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Torres

customer_reviews.title: Wiggle room, but fits comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 18 year old son. He wears a size 12 and these fit with a little wiggle room. He thought they were gonna be too big, but he fits them comfortably. No complaints as of yet lol. Worth the buy in my opinion. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Plain box makes me wonder
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never met a pair of Nike’s that didn’t come in a Nike box. That makes me nervous for the life of the shoes. That being said, we’ve only had them one day and they look and fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This are my favorite because I can slip them on. I have two pairs. Trying to buy more before they disappear completely
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Slip, sliding away.....
customer_reviews.text: My heel wants to slide out of the shoe when training... not a big fan of the “sock style” shoe instead of having a true tongue.. inside heel cushioning plus low profile of the heel, causes problems...
customer_reviews.author: Zoomz

customer_reviews.title: Get your exact size that you wear in men’s size. It’s a great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, true to the size. They are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: India B

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice looking shoes. Shoe strings fall out.
customer_reviews.text: Got for my 12 y/o. He likes the style and they fit as expected. Shoe strings constantly fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Eh, ok. Great colors
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like that the sides that hold the laces in are a hard plastic. Should be a more flexible material.
customer_reviews.author: kris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I love the color schemes love them got 2 pairs these and the black and white ! I use the black n white for work and there amazing for 10 hours on my feet oookkkaaayy NIKE & AMAZON hit ya girl up sponsor meee . Yes I work for amazon!
customer_reviews.author: _AayP

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and they look great! Be sure to order a half size larger than you usually wear.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: It is so annoying because when you find a great shoe, Nike discontinue it. This shoes is the best, most comfortable shoe ever.
customer_reviews.author: raewyn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got true to size for my son. These shoes are even better looking in person!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in 2-3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: It’s showing sign of damage after 2 weeks of purchase, it’s COVID19 time and I walked only a few miles but cloth is ripped from front, I would like a replacement as shoes is comfortable and I don’t want to return.
customer_reviews.author: iphone user

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift for our grandson. These shoes are really sharp looking I think he will love them.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Price was right and the shoes are working out nicely.
customer_reviews.author: yoga momma

customer_reviews.title: Nike
customer_reviews.text: Pick the size you normally wear in Nikes. As seen in pics.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits perfect but the sides of the shoe has a hard rubber piece and it puts pressure on the side of my foot and causes the side of my feet to hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely all day comfort.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect. They’re just right for daily wear and while I work. So far I’ve been comfortable wearing them for 10+ hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony O.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: They're super comfy! They may be mens shoes, but they look better than what they offer for womens!
customer_reviews.author: Lesa

customer_reviews.title: 1000% Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought a shirt to match the shoes, and I always get compliments when I wear them together. The shoes are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Bronaton

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. It was cheaper on. Nike’s site but they sold out quickly. Price is worth it since shoes seem to be over $100 for anything decent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe for the Money
customer_reviews.text: This shoe not only looks good, it feels good. Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Fstory

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for a young nephew. He was thrilled with them.
customer_reviews.author: DiShopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in a box with a rubber band around it. The right shoe has creases as if it was a return that was shipped to us. Photos attached. Disappointed with the packaging and the creases.
customer_reviews.author: Usha Ramanathan

customer_reviews.title: The right choice
customer_reviews.text: Great look and comfy. Delivered promptly and fix was as expected
customer_reviews.author: LeAnne Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for the price. I bought different soles for them to make them comfy. Overall very stylish shoes for daily activities.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Campanile

customer_reviews.title: Husband approves
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves! He stands at work all day and is very comfortable in these while doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Darian Kanagy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comfort 😌!
customer_reviews.text: My son luv's em! My son's flat footed, it's difficult to find shoes that are comfortable for him. Nikes always been his first choice 🎉!!!!! Big supporter of Nike! Will purchase another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Bre'

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and style of this shoe not to mention how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Palberti

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and confortable
customer_reviews.text: Great for everyday use. Stylish and very confortable soft interior feels great with or without socks. NOT RUNNING SHOES these are runner shoes they are meant to look sporty to wear with joggers but are mostly for looks.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo J Valdivia

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, light weight and I couldn't believe the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable/casual
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my boyfriend and he absolutely loves them! He says these shoes are his most comfortable pair! He’s a size 13 and they fit him perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Maria13

customer_reviews.title: Great fit- amazing price
customer_reviews.text: These were a perfect fit. Comfortable as most Nike’s are. Also an amazing price. I had been eyeing them for a little bit every store had them for $70 or more.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Siekierski

customer_reviews.title: Fit, style, and price makes this shoe a home run!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good with no room for the foot to slip around. The first day I put them on I forgot three hours later that they were new! A very good shoe for people on their feet a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Marshall

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe. Was to small ant the width was to small as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Fleischman

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable but the thing that the laces loop around sort of squeeze your feet but if you lace it correctly it’s an easy fix
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nike
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe but need to order minimum one size bigger for correct size
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend so he had a nice pair of shoes to wear to the gym and he absolutely loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Winstead

customer_reviews.title: N/a
customer_reviews.text: I thought the over 25 dollars it’s a free shipping and I just bought another pair of shoes and it’s was more than 25 dollars and still charging shipping
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Comtarble
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great, fits well for me since i work on my feet all day. They only thing is they run small so you can get one up on your size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome I feel like Jordan when I put these on I make my wifey fly high with these on
customer_reviews.author: Big J

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sneakers for my sons and they love it ! Great Deal !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ver comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son. He claims they are the most comfortable shoes he has ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Yes 👍
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the comfortability of the shoe and the bright colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my husband and he is loving them. Says they’re extremely comfortable and fit well. Looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Like A Glove
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight with excellent arch support. Lacing system complements the snug, fitted design.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bil

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: They had Bad creases ... the shoe laces were two different sizes .. waste of money I’ll never buy anything from them again
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable i am a surgical tech and standing all day was a breeze with these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Randy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfect. Nike usually runs a half size small in my opinion and I say these are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sore but worth it
customer_reviews.text: A little tight at first. Hurt my feet. When I wore them For a day or 2 the. Loosened up a bit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe Overall
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable to have on while being on my feet all day at work! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for short notice!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I was struggling to find a pair to by my boyfriend forever and when I finally found these it was simple and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Baker

customer_reviews.title: Like it !
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable shoes. I use them to work out so they are really doing the job .
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband right before going to Disney World. He said they felt AMAZING and were very comfortable walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mya

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and nice looking. I want them in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: ryan elder

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: No issues with the service - but very disappointed with the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SHOES!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing!! So comfortable, I did get 1/2 a size bigger than usual and they fit great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bottom of the show is kind of slippery around the edges because of the material.
customer_reviews.author: aidan

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: They were so tight they hurt to walk with them
customer_reviews.author: Jay

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Acalme Track & Field Shoes
product_meta.description: Shoes from Nike brand. Model - Nike acalme. Reference AQ2224-002
